Additional Scope Comments: All account holders other than Capstone account holders will be covered by Item 011.All email will be cutoff for Capstone account holders at the end of employee tenure.  Transfer 25 years after cutoff.
Legacy Email Scope: The Library will be including legacy e-mail for all account holders dating back to approximately 2010.  Prior to 2010 the Library incorporated a print and file policy for email.

Name of Agency to Which this Form Applie: Alcohol and Tobacco Tax and Trade Bureau
Cutoff Instructions: Cut off in five-year blocks at the end of the calendar year.
Transfer Instructions: Transfer email records 15 years after the cutoff.
Legacy Email Scope: TTB will apply the Capstone approach to email records management (GRS 6.1) retrospectively to all available legacy email.  TTB has some permanent email from accounts that pre-date 2003 that were active at the time of re-organization, which originated with TTB's predecessor organization within the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, and Firearms (ATF).  Email from accounts inactive at the time of re-organization were not transferred to TTB.  ATF is responsible for managing these records.  Also, pre-dated 2003 printed email records are maintained in respective industry/case file disposed as per record schedule.
